entries.rebel_start: You are casually doing propaganda work for the Rebel Alliance. Decorate 10 Life Day Trees to finish your daily quota.
entries.imperial_start: You are casually doing propaganda work for the Empire. Destroy 10 piles of Life Day Presents to finish your daily quota.
entries.imperial_competitive_start: You are competitively doing propaganda work for the Empire. Destroy as many piles of Life Day Presents as you can in 30 minutes!
entries.rebel_competitive_start: You are competitively doing propaganda work for the Rebel Alliance. Decorate as many Life Day Trees as you can in 30 minutes!
entries.already_dressed: This Life Day Tree has already been decorated.
entries.already_stomped: This pile of Life Day Presents has already been destroyed.
entries.wrong_faction: You are not supposed to interact with that object.
entries.locked_out: You have reached your daily quota. Come back tomorrow!
entries.neutral_imperial_comp_start: You are competitively doing mercenary work for the Empire. Destroy as many piles of Life Day Presents as you can in 30 minutes!
entries.neutral_rebel_comp_start: You are competitively doing mercenary work for the Rebel Alliance. Decorate as many Life Day Trees as you can in 30 minutes!
entries.neutral_imperial_cas_start: You are casually doing mercenary work for the Empire. Destroy 10 piles of Life Day Presents to finish your daily quota.
entries.neutral_rebel_cas_start: You are casually doing mercenary work for the Rebel Alliance. Decorate 10 Life Day Trees to finish your daily quota.
entries.tokens_rebel: You have received 4682B45 Rebel Alliance Propaganda TokensFFFFFF.
entries.tokens_rebel_high: You have received 4682B415 Rebel Alliance Propaganda TokensFFFFFF for completing an objective while declared!
entries.tokens_imperial: You have received 9400D35 Imperial Propaganda TokensFFFFFF.
entries.tokens_imperial_high: You have received 9400D315 Imperial Propaganda TokensFFFFFF for completing an objective while declared!
entries.pick_path: You have to visit a Life Day Organizer and decide whether to casually or competitively join the festivities.
entries.reached_limit: You have finished your daily quota. Come back tomorrow!
entries.time_is_up: You have finished all the objectives you can for the day. Come back tomorrow!
entries.mounted: You can't do that while on any sort of mount or vehicle.
